actions.text: Amendment SA 1405 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 138.

Amendment SA 1405 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1796; text: CR S1796) To establish appropriate limitations on the Administrator of the Small Business Administration establishing new priorities for processing lender applications.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1405 proposed by Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1405 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 138.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1405 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 138.

purpose: To establish appropriate limitations on the Administrator of the Small Business Administration establishing new priorities for processing lender applications.
